name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Alkanes and Their Stereochemistry
3. Cycloalkanes and Their Stereochemistry
4. Structure and Reactivity of Alkenes
5. Reactions and Synthesis of Alkenes
6. Alkynes
7. Stereochemistry
8. Organohalides
9. 期中考
10.Nucleophilic Substitutions and Eliminations
11.Mass Spectrometry and Infrared Spectroscopy
12.Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy
13.Conjugated Compounds
14.Benzene and Aromaticity
15.Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution
16.Aldehydes and Ketones
17.Carboxylic Acids and Nitriles
18.期末考
